### ContainsProtectableArray() {#acf3eb0f1888bed0ff1df0667cd1036aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool ContainsProtectableArray (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, unsigned SSPBufferSize, bool &amp; IsLarge, bool Strong, bool InStruct)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="[out] IsLarge">is set to true if a protectable array is found and it is &quot;large&quot; ( &gt;= ssp-buffer-size). In the case of a structure with multiple arrays, this gets set if any of them is large.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<MemberDefinition

entry: StackGuardSlot = alloca i8&#42; StackGuard = &lt;stack guard&gt; call void @llvm.stackprotector(StackGuard, StackGuardSlot)

Returns true if the platform/triple supports the stackprotectorcreate pseudo node.

### InsertStackProtectors() {#a2e130f575ee6cbddeb0d62b295dee036}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InsertStackProtectors (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &#42; TM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU, bool &amp; HasPrologue, bool &amp; HasIRCheck)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
InsertStackProtectors - Insert code into the prologue and epilogue of the function.

<ul>
<li>The prologue code loads and stores the stack guard onto the stack.</li>
<li>The epilogue checks the value stored in the prologue against the original value. It calls &#95;&#95;stack&#95;chk&#95;fail if they differ.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00547">547</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/stackprotector-cpp">StackProtector.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass inserts stack protectors into functions which need them. A variable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a random value in it is stored onto the stack before the local variables</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are allocated. Upon exiting the block, the stored value is checked. If it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// changed, then there was some sort of violation and the program aborts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// InsertStackProtectors - Insert code into the prologue and epilogue of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - The prologue code loads and stores the stack guard onto the stack.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - The epilogue checks the value stored in the prologue against the original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///    value. It calls &#95;&#95;stack&#95;chk&#95;fail if they differ.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param &#91;out&#93; IsLarge is set to true if a protectable array is found and</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check whether or not this function needs a stack protector based</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="comment">/// upon the stack protector level.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We use two heuristics: a standard (ssp) and strong (sspstrong).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The standard heuristic which will add a guard variable to functions that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="comment">/// call alloca with a either a variable size or a size &gt;= SSPBufferSize,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// functions with character buffers larger than SSPBufferSize, and functions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with aggregates containing character buffers larger than SSPBufferSize. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// strong heuristic will add a guard variables to functions that call alloca</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">/// regardless of size, functions with any buffer regardless of type and size,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">/// functions with aggregates that contain any buffer regardless of type and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">/// size, and functions that contain stack-based variables that have had their</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">/// address taken.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssplayoutanalysis/#a9263d83965e9f3c52e94ff91bc96eb9c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssplayoutanalysis/#a9263d83965e9f3c52e94ff91bc96eb9c">SSPLayoutAnalysis::requiresStackProtector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               SSPLayoutMap &#42;Layout) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Strong = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NeedsProtector = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// been taken.  This set is maintained to ensure we don&#39;t visit the same PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node multiple times.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re instrumenting a block with a tail call, the check has to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserted before the call rather than between it and the return. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// verifier guarantees that a tail call is either directly before the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return or with a single correct bitcast of the return value in between so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we don&#39;t need to worry about many situations here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Prev = CheckLoc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a512494b857b0644c1f722531e3ee5495">getPrevNonDebugInstruction</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;GuardCheck = TLI-&gt;getSSPStackGuardCheck(&#42;M)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Generate the function-based epilogue instrumentation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The target provides a guard check function, generate a call to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(CheckLoc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Guard = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateLoad(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getPtrTy(), AI, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Guard&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;setAttributes(GuardCheck-&gt;getAttributes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;setCallingConv(GuardCheck-&gt;getCallingConv());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Generate the epilogue with inline instrumentation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we do not support SelectionDAG based calls, generate IR level</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each block with a return instruction, convert this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   return:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ret ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   return:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     %1 = &lt;stack guard&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     %2 = load StackGuardSlot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     %3 = icmp ne i1 %1, %2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     br i1 %3, label %CallStackCheckFailBlk, label %SP&#95;return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   SP&#95;return:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ret ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   CallStackCheckFailBlk:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     call void @&#95;&#95;stack&#95;chk&#95;fail()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     unreachable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the FailBB. We duplicate the BB every time since the MI tail</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// merge pass will merge together all of the various BB into one including</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
